title: Saas Sensor Web App Development Firm
text: Questions Business Summary This Company needs a strategic partner to support its fulfillment of new large scale multimillion customer contracts. The Company is a mobile application development firm with products focused on serving the B2C advertising needs of its customers. The Company's primary product is a content management platform built for beacon technology which enables businesses to advertise to their customers when they are closest to the point of purchase while collecting highly valuable analytics. With mobile and internet application development as its core competency the Company maintains an onshore-offshore strategy to best provide local technical talent and sales expertise while leveraging lower cost high quality development talent overseas. The outsourced development systems are seamless and efficient. The Company also maintains a proprietary mobile application that cuts costs while increasing the speed of new product adoption and overall efficacy of sales teams for F500 enterprises as well as small and middle market businesses. The product allows sales divisions to perform better. Though providing quality products and services has generated recurring revenues that continue to increase with each sale, the company has a customer concentration in the food and education industry verticals. As its products have gained traction, management seeks to find a strategic corporate partner to enable it to faster scale adoption of its beacon technology and more effectively capitalize on the opportunities in its pipeline both in and out of the food and education markets.
